mapper.select: SELECT rptcode rptStat,rpttime,hisId id from sms_rpt_backups where rpttime >=20180508000000 and rpttime < 20180518000000 and hisId=#{id}
SELECT id,mtype,senddate,uid,mobile,channel,content,contentNum,stat from sms_send_history_unknown where uid=601584 and senddate > 20180710000000
SELECT rptcode rptStat,rpttime from sms_rpt_backups where hisId=#{id} limit 1
